description: It's a play on words with Snow White's dwarfs.
title: Dwarfs' Dilemma
n_1: The dwarfs are gathered in their cozy cottage.
n_2: Doc pulls out a survey report.
c1_2: 6 out of 7 of us aren't happy!
n_4: Happy, the seventh dwarf, is seen smiling in the background.
c1_4: At least one of us is!
